description: Episode number 11 of Series "Teenagers' guide to the galaxy". Part of a series developed for young people aged 9-16 which deals with issues of communication skills, interpersonal skills, life skills and problem solving. "Making a good impression" discusses what is required to impress others, particularly when applying for a job. Includes hints and advice by teenagers and adults on appearance; manners and etiquette; respect for yourself and others; initiative; preparation; confidence. Features Colette Mann as Fay.
